name: ABC
text:
Brigham Young University graduate Matt Easton came out during his commencement speech in April 2019.

He reflects on how his life has changed since that now-famous speech and how the world reacted to learning he is gay. https://t.co/yZMFyUWLMh

text: New Yorkers get their first haircuts in months as New York City officially begins phase 2 of its reopening, allowing salons, barbershops, and other businesses to commence operations with reduced capacity and strict social distancing guidelines. https://t.co/t8sR5wL85j https://t.co/WfNc2Za2C5
